segments.text: I see the open cabinets with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing up on the stool to get to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks really unsteady, legs spreading out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, helping by waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the sink, water is running endlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin is full, overflowing onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't notice, too busy with her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron might get wet from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is slippery now with that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view contrasts the tension here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon to stop it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
